title: Ticket, passport and tarot cards. Episode 18. The Star
abstract: A personal journey through tarot and Argentina
description: AIRED 29 December 2005  Based on a popular book from Tarot expert Linda Marson, this series is a a unique combination of personal diary, travel journal and Tarot imagery. Screened as a weekly show on Channel 31 in Melbourne, T, P and TC was a five minute filler program that screened from 1 September 2005 -  26 January 2006.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001092; Channel 31 content for Memory Grid: TV50 special feature; Active; Sep 2007
